name: TimeOut (chatonpeteur)
description:
Welcome everyone !

This is an attempt for the trijam 155 :
the result ? A stress Game xD

2 mechanics :
- click to shoot target
- space bar to jump 

Have fun xD

---

For the future :

  • Improve Graphics
  • Add Music (which speeds up with the game)
  • Add Sounds
  • Add more levels and a randomizer to launch minigames
  • A score board
